name: Business Shark (itch)
description:
Originally made for the StartupCities Game Jam.


He does business and he is a shark, so he's a business shark.

Play through the epic day-to-day adventures of Business Shark! Try to survive in a world of corporate greed, and strive for that promotion!

How to play:

A/D or ←/→ : Movement
W or ↑ : Hop
Space : Do Business

How did you even think of such a brilliant idea?
Well, I often see businessmen on the bus and was thinking about sharks so there you go.

This game was made to be played in a browser, but is downloadable on Windows in case you encounter any issues.

Far from as big and polished as I wanted it to be but eh, I'm quite happy with it.
